price: 40. Rabbiyow! Iga yeel mid ooga salaadda aniga iyo durriyadeydaba, Rabbigayow! Iga aqbal baryadayda (iyo cibaadeysigayga).
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
